title: volume-erode
description:
Erode a volume file.

Around each voxel with a value of zero, set surrounding voxels to zero.  The surrounding voxels are all face neighbors and all voxels within the specified distance (center to center).

opt_roi_roi_volume.title: opt_roi_roi_volume
opt_roi_roi_volume.description: assume voxels outside this roi are nonzero: volume file, positive values denote voxels that have data
